remarks: Lemma for ~ pnt .  Package up ~ pntlemo in quantifiers.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Apr-2016.)
statement:
pntlem1.r $e |- R = ( a e. RR+ |-> ( ( psi ` a ) - a ) ) $.
pntlem1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR+ ) $.
pntlem1.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) $.
pntlem1.l $e |- ( ph -> L e. ( 0 (,) 1 ) ) $.
pntlem1.d $e |- D = ( A + 1 ) $.
pntlem1.f $e |- F = ( ( 1 - ( 1 / D ) ) x. ( ( L / ( ; 3 2 x. B ) ) / ( D ^ 2 ) ) ) $.
pntlem1.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. RR+ ) $.
pntlem1.u2 $e |- ( ph -> U <_ A ) $.
pntlem1.e $e |- E = ( U / D ) $.
pntlem1.k $e |- K = ( exp ` ( B / E ) ) $.
pntlem1.y $e |- ( ph -> ( Y e. RR+ /\ 1 <_ Y ) ) $.
pntlem1.x $e |- ( ph -> ( X e. RR+ /\ Y < X ) ) $.
pntlem1.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
pntlem1.w $e |- W = ( ( ( Y + ( 4 / ( L x. E ) ) ) ^ 2 ) + ( ( ( X x. ( K ^ 2 ) ) ^ 4 ) + ( exp ` ( ( ( ; 3 2 x. B ) / ( ( U - E ) x. ( L x. ( E ^ 2 ) ) ) ) x. ( ( U x. 3 ) + C ) ) ) ) ) $.
pntleme.U $e |- ( ph -> A. z e. ( Y [,) +oo ) ( abs ` ( ( R ` z ) / z ) ) <_ U ) $.
pntleme.K $e |- ( ph -> A. k e. ( K [,) +oo ) A. y e. ( X (,) +oo ) E. z e. RR+ ( ( y < z /\ ( ( 1 + ( L x. E ) ) x. z ) < ( k x. y ) ) /\ A. u e. ( z [,] ( ( 1 + ( L x. E ) ) x. z ) ) ( abs ` ( ( R ` u ) / u ) ) <_ E ) ) $.
pntleme.C $e |- ( ph -> A. z e. ( 1 (,) +oo ) ( ( ( ( abs ` ( R ` z ) ) x. ( log ` z ) ) - ( ( 2 / ( log ` z ) ) x. sum_ i e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` ( z / Y ) ) ) ( ( abs ` ( R ` ( z / i ) ) ) x. ( log ` i ) ) ) ) / z ) <_ C ) $.
pntleme $p |- ( ph -> E. w e. RR+ A. v e. ( w [,) +oo ) ( abs ` ( ( R ` v ) / v ) ) <_ ( U - ( F x. ( U ^ 3 ) ) ) ) $.
